parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| order by name asc
| summarize Selected = makelist(id, 10), All = makelist(id, 1000)
| mvexpand All limit 100
| project value = tostring(All), label = tostring(All), selected = iff(Selected contains All, true, false)

content.query:
managedservicesresources
| where type == "microsoft.managedservices/registrationassignments"
| where properties.provisioningState == "Succeeded"
| extend ManageeTenantName = properties.registrationDefinition.properties.manageeTenantName
| extend ManageeTenantId = properties.registrationDefinition.properties.manageeTenantId
| extend ManagedByTenantName = properties.registrationDefinition.properties.managedByTenantName
| extend ManagedByTenantId = properties.registrationDefinition.properties.managedByTenantId
| extend PermanentAccess = properties.registrationDefinition.properties.authorizations
| extend JITAccess = properties.registrationDefinition.properties.eligibleAuthorizations
| extend AddedDate = properties.registrationDefinition.systemData.createdAt
| extend CreatedBy = systemData.createdBy
| project ManageeTenantName, ManageeTenantId, ManagedByTenantName, ManagedByTenantId, AddedDate, CreatedBy
content.title: Azure Lighthouse Delegations

content.json:
# [IoT/OT Threat Monitoring with Defender for IoT](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-sentinel-blog/defending-critical-infrastructure-with-the-microsoft-sentinel-it/ba-p/3061184)
---

Welcome to the IoT/OT Threat Monitoring with Defender for IoT Workbook. 
This workbook provides a guided investigation for entities based on open incidents, alerts sign-ins and activity for IT/OT assets. This workbook also provides hunting via MITRE ATT&CK® for ICS, and designed to enable SecOps Analysts, Security Engineers, and MSSPs to gain situational awareness for IT/OT security posture.

links.linkLabel: Get Started with Microsoft Defender for IoT

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
    | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
    | extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
    | where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
    | where properties.status != "Closed"
    | where properties.severity == "High"
    | summarize AlertCount2=count()
content.title: HIGH

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
    | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
    | extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
    | where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
    | where properties.status != "Closed"
    | where properties.severity == "Medium"
    | summarize AlertCount2=count()
content.title: MEDIUM

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
    | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
    | extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
    | where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
    | where properties.status != "Closed"
    | where properties.severity == "Low"
    | summarize AlertCount2=count()
content.title: LOW

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
    | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
    | extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
    | where TimeFirstSeen >= ago(1d)
    | where properties.status != "Closed"
    | summarize AlertCount2=count()
content.title: NEW TODAY

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
    | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
    | extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
    | where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
    | where properties.status != "Closed"
    | where properties.severity == "High"
    | summarize AlertCount2=count() by tostring(properties.displayName)
    | sort by AlertCount2
    | take 250
content.title: TOP HIGH SEVERITY ALERTS

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
    | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
    | extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
    | where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
    | summarize AlertCount=count() by bin(todatetime(TimeFirstSeen), 1d), tostring(properties.severity)
content.title: TRENDING

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
    | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
    | extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
    | where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
    | mv-expand deviceEntities=properties.entities
    | extend AlertDeviceName = tostring(deviceEntities.DeviceName)
    | extend AlertID=tostring(properties.systemAlertId)
    | join kind=leftouter (iotsecurityresources 
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices' 
         | where isnotnull(properties.sensor.site)
         | extend Site=tostring(properties.sensor.site)
         | extend DeviceName = tostring(properties.deviceName)
         | project Site, DeviceName) on $left.AlertDeviceName == $right.DeviceName
    | where DeviceName != ""
    | summarize AlertCount=dcount(AlertID) by Site
    | take 20
content.title: Alerts by Site

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
    | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
    | extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
    | where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
    | mv-expand deviceEntities=properties.entities
    | extend AlertDeviceName = tostring(deviceEntities.DeviceName)
    | extend AlertID=tostring(properties.systemAlertId)
    | join kind=leftouter (iotsecurityresources 
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices' 
         | where isnotnull(properties.sensor.zone)
         | extend Zone=tostring(properties.sensor.zone)
         | extend DeviceName = tostring(properties.deviceName)
         | project Zone, DeviceName) on $left.AlertDeviceName == $right.DeviceName
    | where DeviceName != ""
    | summarize AlertCount=dcount(AlertID) by Zone
    | take 20
content.title: Alerts by Zone

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
| where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
| extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
| where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
| extend SensorId_ = tostring(properties.extendedProperties.SensorId)
| where isnotempty(SensorId_)
| summarize count() by SensorId_
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Alerts by Sensor

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
    | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
    | extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
    | where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
    | summarize kwSum=count() by tostring(properties.productComponentName)
    | sort by kwSum
content.title: ⬇️ SELECTOR

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
    | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
    | extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
    | extend AlertSeverity=tostring(properties.severity)
    | extend Status=tostring(properties.status)
    | extend Engine=tostring(properties.productComponentName)
    | where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
    | where tostring('{_sensorengine}') has Engine or isempty(dynamic('{_sensorengine}'))
    | summarize kwSum=count() by AlertSeverity
    | sort by AlertSeverity asc
content.title: SEVERITY

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
    | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
    | extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
    | extend AlertSeverity=tostring(properties.severity)
    | extend Engine=tostring(properties.productComponentName)
    | where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
    | where tostring('{_sensorengine}') has Engine or isempty(dynamic('{_sensorengine}'))
    | where tostring('{p_engine}') has AlertSeverity or isempty('{p_engine}')
    | summarize event_count=count() by bin(todatetime(TimeFirstSeen), 1d)
content.title: TRENDING

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
| where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
| extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc

| mv-expand deviceEntities=properties.entities
| extend deviceType = tostring(deviceEntities.DeviceType)
| where isnotempty(deviceType)
| where deviceType != "Unclassified"
| summarize count() by deviceType
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: DEVICE_TYPE

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
| where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
| extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
| where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
| mv-expand deviceEntities=properties.entities
| extend deviceVendor = tostring(deviceEntities.Vendor)
| where isnotempty(deviceVendor)

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
| where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
| extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
| where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
| mv-expand deviceEntities=properties.entities
| extend deviceName = tostring(deviceEntities.DeviceName)
| extend deviceLink = tostring(deviceEntities.DevicePageLink)
| where isnotempty(deviceName)
| summarize count() by deviceName, deviceLink
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Affected Devices

content.query:
iotsecurityresources 
| where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
| extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.startTimeUtc
| where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
| extend AlertName = tostring(properties.displayName)
| extend AlertSeverity = tostring(properties.severity)
| extend Status = tostring(properties.status)
| extend Tactics = tostring(properties.intent)
| extend data = split(id, '/')
| extend type = tostring(properties.alertType)
| extend StringforBase64function = strcat('{"alertType":"', type, '","location":"', data[6], '","deviceGroupName":"', data[8], '","alertId":"', data[10], '","subscriptionId":"', data[2], '"}')
| extend alertlink = base64_encode_tostring(StringforBase64function)
| extend SeverityRank = iff(AlertSeverity == "High", 3, iff(AlertSeverity == "Medium", 2, iff(AlertSeverity == "Low", 1, iff(AlertSeverity == "Informational", 0, 0))))
| sort by SeverityRank, todatetime(TimeFirstSeen) 
| project TimeFirstSeen,  AlertName,  AlertSeverity, Tactics, Status, AlertLink=strcat("https://portal.azure.com/#view/Microsoft_Azure_IoT_Defender/IAlertBlade/data/",alertlink)
| take 50
content.title: 🟦 Recent Security Alerts

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ProviderIncidentId
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot" or Title contains "(MDIoT)"
| where Severity == "High" and Status != "Closed"
| summarize kwSum=dcount(ProviderIncidentId)
content.title: HIGH

content.query:

| where ProductName contains "iot" or Title contains "(MDIoT)"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ProviderIncidentId
| where Status == "Active"
| summarize kwSum=dcount(ProviderIncidentId)

content.query:

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| extend SystemAlertId = tostring(AlertIds[0])
| join (SecurityAlert) on SystemAlertId
| mv-expand deviceEntities=parse_json(Entities)
| extend deviceSite = tostring(deviceEntities.Site)
| where isnotempty(deviceSite) 
| summarize AlertCount=dcount(ProviderIncidentId) by deviceSite 
| sort by AlertCount desc
content.title: SITE

| extend deviceZone = tostring(deviceEntities.Zone)

| limit 20

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot" or Title contains "(MDIoT)"

content.title: CLOSE CODES

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot" or Title contains "(MDIoT)"
| summarize arg_max(LastModifiedTime,*) by IncidentNumber 
| extend TimeToTriage =  (FirstModifiedTime - CreatedTime)/1h
| summarize 50th_Percentile=percentile(TimeToTriage, 50)
content.title: MEAN TIME TO RESPOND

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot" or Title contains "(MDIoT)"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by IncidentNumber 
| extend TimeToResolve =  (ClosedTime - CreatedTime)/1d
| summarize 50th_Percentile=percentile(TimeToResolve, 50)
content.title: MEAN TIME TO RESOLVE

content.query:

| join (SecurityAlert) on SystemAlertId
| extend IPAddress = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].IpAddress)).Address)
| where CompromisedEntity <> ""
| summarize count() by CompromisedEntity
| where CompromisedEntity has "."
| sort by count_ desc
| limit 250

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend Tactics = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.tactics)))
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot" or Title contains "(MDIoT)"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ProviderIncidentId
| parse IncidentUrl with * '/#asset/Microsoft_Azure_Security_Insights/Incident' IncidentBlade
| extend SeverityRank=iff(Severity == "High", 3, iff(Severity == "Medium", 2, iff(Severity == "Low", 1, iff(Severity == "Informational", 0, 0))))
| sort by SeverityRank, TimeGenerated desc
| project ['Incident Name']=Title, IncidentNumber, Severity, IncidentUrl, ProductName, FirstActivityTime, IncidentBlade
| limit 250
content.noDataMessage: No Incidents Observed Within These Thresholds

parameters.name: SiteName
parameters.label: Site
parameters.query:
iotsecurityresources
| where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices"
| extend Site=properties.sensor.site
| where Site != ""
| summarize by tostring(Site)

parameters.name: SeverityName
parameters.label: Severity
parameters.query:
iotsecurityresources
| where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/vulnerabilities"
| extend Severity=properties.severityScore
| summarize by tostring(Severity)

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
| where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/vulnerabilities"
| extend DeviceID = tostring(properties.deviceId)

| extend severity=properties['severityScore']
| extend Severity=properties.severityScore
| where Severity in ({SeverityName})
| join  kind=leftouter (iotsecurityresources
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices'
         | project DeviceSiteName=tostring(properties.sensor.site), name) on $left.DeviceID == $right.name
| where DeviceSiteName in ({SiteName})
| summarize count() by tostring(severity )
content.title: CVE by Severity

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/vulnerabilities"
    | extend severity=properties['severityScore'],
    deviceId=tostring(properties['deviceId']),
    score=properties['score'],
    cveName = properties['vulnerabilityId'],
    cveDes=properties['description']
    | project deviceId
    | join  kind=leftouter (iotsecurityresources
             | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices'
             | project Site=tostring(properties.sensor.site), name) on $left.deviceId == $right.name
    | where Site in ({SiteName})
    | summarize count() by Site
    | project site = iff(Site=="", "Managed IoT Hub", Site), count_
content.title: CVE by Site

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
| where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/vulnerabilities"
| extend DeviceID = tostring(properties.deviceId)
| extend severity=properties['severityScore'],
    deviceId=tostring(properties['deviceId']),
    score=properties['score'],
    cveName = properties['vulnerabilityId'],
    cveDes=properties['description']
| mv-expand components=properties['affectedComponents'] 
| extend vendor=components['vendor'],
    version=components['version'],
    type=components['type'],
    product=components['product']
| extend Severity=properties.severityScore
| where Severity in ({SeverityName})
| join  kind=leftouter (iotsecurityresources
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices'
         | project DeviceSiteName=tostring(properties.sensor.site), name) on $left.DeviceID == $right.name
| where DeviceSiteName in ({SiteName})
| summarize count() by tostring(cveName), tostring(vendor) 
| summarize count() by tostring(vendor) 
| where vendor != '*'
content.title: CVE by Vendor

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
| where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/vulnerabilities"
| extend DeviceID = tostring(properties.deviceId)
| extend severity=properties['severityScore'],
    deviceId=tostring(properties['deviceId']),
    score=properties['score'],
    cveName = properties['vulnerabilityId'],
    cveDes=properties['description']
| extend Severity=properties.severityScore
| where Severity in ({SeverityName})
| join  kind=leftouter (iotsecurityresources
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices'
         | project DeviceSiteName=tostring(properties.sensor.site), name) on $left.DeviceID == $right.name
| where DeviceSiteName in ({SiteName})
| summarize count() by tostring(cveName), tostring(cveDes), tostring(severity), tostring(score)
| sort by count_
| project cveName, cveDes, severity, score, count_
content.title: CVEs

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
| where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/vulnerabilities"
| extend severity=properties['severityScore'],
    deviceId=tostring(properties['deviceId']),
    score=properties['score'],
    cveName = properties['vulnerabilityId'],
    cveDes=properties['description']
| where severity in ({SeverityName})
| where cveName == "{pCveName}"
| join  kind=leftouter (iotsecurityresources
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices'
         | project Site=tostring(properties.sensor.site), name, criticality=properties.criticality, deviceName=properties.deviceName) on $left.deviceId == $right.name
| extend site = iff(Site=="", "Managed IoT Hub", Site)
| where site in ({SiteName})
| project deviceId,  tostring(deviceName), site
content.title: Selected CVE - Affected Devices

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
| where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/vulnerabilities"
| extend DeviceID = tostring(properties.deviceId)
| extend severity=properties['severityScore'],
    deviceId=tostring(properties['deviceId']),
    score=properties['score'],
    cveName = properties['vulnerabilityId'],
    cveDes=properties['description']
| extend Severity=properties.severityScore
| where Severity in ({SeverityName})
| join  kind=leftouter (iotsecurityresources
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices'
         | extend DeviceName = tostring(properties.deviceName)
         | project DeviceSiteName=tostring(properties.sensor.site), name, DeviceName) on $left.DeviceID == $right.name
| join kind=leftouter
    (iotsecurityresources 
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
         | where properties.status != "Closed"
         | extend name3= tostring(properties.extendedProperties.SourceDeviceAddress)
         | summarize AlertCount=count() by name3) on $left.DeviceName == $right.name3 
| join kind=leftouter
    (iotsecurityresources 
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
         | where properties.status != "Closed"
         | where tostring(properties.extendedProperties.DestinationDeviceAddress)!=tostring(properties.extendedProperties.SourceDeviceAddress)
         | summarize AlertCount2=count() by name4=tostring(properties.extendedProperties.DestinationDeviceAddress)) on $left.DeviceName == $right.name4 
| where DeviceSiteName in ({SiteName})
| summarize Total = count(), Critical = countif(tostring(severity) == "Critical"), High = countif(tostring(severity) == "High"), Medium = countif(tostring(severity) == "Medium"), Low = countif(tostring(severity) == "Low") by deviceId, DeviceName, DeviceSiteName, AlertCountSum=coalesce(AlertCount,0)+coalesce(AlertCount2,0)
| sort by Total
content.title: Vulnerable Devices

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
| where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/vulnerabilities"
| extend severity=properties['severityScore'],
    deviceId=tostring(properties['deviceId']),
    score=properties['score'],
    cveName = properties['vulnerabilityId'],
    cveDes=properties['description']
| where severity in ({SeverityName})
| where deviceId == "{pDeviceId}"
| join  kind=leftouter (iotsecurityresources
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices'
         | project Site=tostring(properties.sensor.site), name, criticality=properties.criticality, deviceName=properties.deviceName) on $left.deviceId == $right.name
| extend site = iff(Site=="", "Managed IoT Hub", Site)
| where site in ({SiteName})
| project tostring(cveName), tostring(severity),tostring(score), tostring(cveDes)
| order by score
content.title: Selected Device - Related CVEs

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
| where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/vulnerabilities"
| extend DeviceID = tostring(properties.deviceId)
| extend severity=properties['severityScore'],
    deviceId=tostring(properties['deviceId']),
    score=properties['score'],
    cveName = properties['vulnerabilityId'],
    cveDes=properties['description']
| mv-expand components=properties['affectedComponents'] 
| extend vendor=components['vendor'],
    version=components['version'],
    type=components['type'],
    product=components['product']
| extend Severity=properties.severityScore
| where Severity in ({SeverityName})
| join  kind=leftouter (iotsecurityresources
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices'
         | project DeviceSiteName=tostring(properties.sensor.site), name) on $left.DeviceID == $right.name
| where DeviceSiteName in ({SiteName})
| summarize by tostring(cveName), tostring(vendor), tostring(version),tostring(type), tostring(product), tostring(severity)
|summarize  Total = count(), Critical = countif(tostring(severity) == "Critical"), High = countif(tostring(severity) == "High"), Medium = countif(tostring(severity) == "Medium"), Low = countif(tostring(severity) == "Low") by  tostring(product), tostring(vendor), tostring(version),tostring(type)
| sort by Total
content.title: Vulnerable Components

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
| where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/vulnerabilities"
| extend severity=properties['severityScore'],
    deviceId=tostring(properties['deviceId']),
    score=properties['score'],
    cveName = properties['vulnerabilityId'],
    cveDes=properties['description']
| where severity in ({SeverityName})
| mv-expand components=properties['affectedComponents'] 
| extend vendor=components['vendor'],
    version=components['version'],
    type=components['type'],
    product=components['product']
| where product == "{pProduct}" and version=="{pVersion}" and vendor=="{pVendor}"
| join  kind=leftouter (iotsecurityresources
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices'
         | project Site=tostring(properties.sensor.site), name, criticality=properties.criticality, deviceName=properties.deviceName) on $left.deviceId == $right.name
| extend site = iff(Site=="", "Managed IoT Hub", Site)
| where site in ({SiteName})
| project deviceId,  tostring(deviceName), site
| summarize by deviceId, deviceName, site

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
| where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices"
| extend DeviceName=tostring(properties.deviceName)
| extend Sensor=tostring(properties.sensor.name)
| extend Site=tostring(properties.sensor.site)
| extend tostring(Zone=properties.sensor.zone)
| where Sensor in ({SensorName}, "")
| where Zone in ({ZoneName}, "")
| where Site in ({SiteName}, "")
| summarize CountDevices=count(DeviceName)
content.title: Total Devices

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
| where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices"
| extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.lastSeen
| where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices"
    | extend TimLastSeen=properties.lastSeen
    | extend DeviceName=properties.deviceName
    | where TimLastSeen {TimeRange}
    | extend Sensor=properties.sensor.name
    | where Sensor in ({SensorName})
    | extend DeviceSubType=iff(properties.deviceSubTypeDisplayName=="Unclassified", "", properties.deviceSubTypeDisplayName)
    | extend Site=properties.sensor.site
    | where Site in ({SiteName})
    | extend Zone=tostring(properties.sensor.zone)
    | where Zone in ({ZoneName})
    | extend IPv4=properties.nics.[0].ipv4Address
    | extend MACAddress=properties.nics.[0].macAddress
    | extend Vendor=properties.hardware.vendor
    | extend PurdueLevel=properties.purdueLevel
    | extend OperatingSystem=properties.operatingSystem.platform
    | extend Protocols = trim(@'^\["|"]$|"', tostring(properties.protocols))
    | where properties.deviceDataSource=='OtSensor'
    | extend data=split(id, '/')
    | extend StringforBase64function = strcat('{"subscriptionId":"', data[2], '","deviceId":"', data[10], '","location":"', data[6], '","deviceGroupName":"', data[8], '"}')
    | extend devicelink = base64_encode_tostring(StringforBase64function)
    | project TimLastSeen, tostring(DeviceName),DeviceLink=strcat("https://portal.azure.com/#view/Microsoft_Azure_IoT_Defender/IDeviceBlade/data/",devicelink), tostring(DeviceSubType), tostring(Site), tostring(Zone), tostring(Sensor),tostring(PurdueLevel), tostring(IPv4), tostring(MACAddress), Protocols, tostring(Vendor), tostring(OperatingSystem), DeviceID=name, tostring(name)
    | join kind=leftouter
        (iotsecurityresources 
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/vulnerabilities' 
         | summarize CVECount=count() by name2=tostring(properties.deviceId)) on $left.name == $right.name2 
    | join kind=leftouter
    (iotsecurityresources 
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
         | where properties.status != "Closed"
         | extend name3= tostring(properties.extendedProperties.SourceDeviceAddress)
         | summarize AlertCount=count() by name3) on $left.DeviceName == $right.name3 
    | join kind=leftouter
    (iotsecurityresources 
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
         | where properties.status != "Closed"
         | where tostring(properties.extendedProperties.DestinationDeviceAddress)!=tostring(properties.extendedProperties.SourceDeviceAddress)
         | summarize AlertCount2=count() by name4=tostring(properties.extendedProperties.DestinationDeviceAddress)) on $left.DeviceName == $right.name4 
    | project  TimLastSeen, tostring(DeviceName), DeviceLink, tostring(DeviceSubType), AlertCountSum=coalesce(AlertCount,0)+coalesce(AlertCount2,0), CVECount, tostring(Site), tostring(Zone), tostring(Sensor),tostring(PurdueLevel), tostring(IPv4), tostring(MACAddress), Protocols, tostring(Vendor), tostring(OperatingSystem), DeviceID=name
   | sort by tostring(TimLastSeen)
content.title: 🟦 OT Assets

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices"
    | extend TimeFirstSeen=properties.firstSeen
    | extend DeviceName=properties.deviceName
    | where TimeFirstSeen {TimeRange}
    | extend DeviceSubType=iff(properties.deviceSubTypeDisplayName=="Unclassified", "", properties.deviceSubTypeDisplayName)
    | extend Site=properties.sensor.site
    | where properties.deviceDataSource=='OtSensor'
    | extend data=split(id, '/')
    | extend StringforBase64function = strcat('{"subscriptionId":"', data[2], '","deviceId":"', data[10], '","location":"', data[6], '","deviceGroupName":"', data[8], '"}')
    | extend devicelink = base64_encode_tostring(StringforBase64function)
    | project TimeFirstSeen, tostring(DeviceName), DeviceLink=strcat("https://portal.azure.com/#view/Microsoft_Azure_IoT_Defender/IDeviceBlade/data/",devicelink), tostring(DeviceSubType), tostring(Site)
    | join kind=leftouter
    (iotsecurityresources 
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
         | where properties.status != "Closed"
         | extend name3= tostring(properties.extendedProperties.SourceDeviceAddress)
         | summarize AlertCount=count() by name3) on $left.DeviceName == $right.name3 
    | join kind=leftouter
    (iotsecurityresources 
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
         | where properties.status != "Closed"
         | where tostring(properties.extendedProperties.DestinationDeviceAddress)!=tostring(properties.extendedProperties.SourceDeviceAddress)
         | summarize AlertCount2=count() by name4=tostring(properties.extendedProperties.DestinationDeviceAddress)) on $left.DeviceName == $right.name4 
    | project  TimeFirstSeen, tostring(DeviceName), DeviceLink, tostring(DeviceSubType), AlertCountSum=coalesce(AlertCount,0)+coalesce(AlertCount2,0), tostring(Site)
   | sort by tostring(TimeFirstSeen)
   | take 50
content.title: Recent Discovered Devices

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ProviderIncidentId
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot" or Title contains "(MDIoT)"
| extend SystemAlertId = tostring(AlertIds[0])
| join (SecurityAlert) on SystemAlertId
| mv-expand deviceEntities=parse_json(Entities)
| extend deviceSite = tostring(deviceEntities.Site)
| where isnotempty(deviceSite) 
| summarize AlertCount=dcount(ProviderIncidentId) by deviceSite 
| sort by AlertCount desc
content.title: Incidents by Site

content.query:

| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ProviderIncidentId
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot" or Title contains "(MDIoT)"
| summarize AlertCount=count() by tostring(Severity)
content.title: Incidents by Severity

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ProviderIncidentId
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot" or Title contains "(MDIoT)"
| summarize AlertCount=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d),tostring(Severity)
content.title: Incidents Trend Overtime

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber
| parse IncidentUrl with * '/#asset/Microsoft_Azure_Security_Insights/Incident' IncidentBlade
| extend SeverityRank=iff(Severity == "High", 3, iff(Severity == "Medium", 2, iff(Severity == "Low", 1, iff(Severity == "Informational", 0, 0))))
| sort by SeverityRank, TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated,['Incident Name']=Title, URL=IncidentUrl, IncidentNumber, Severity, Status
| limit 50
content.title: Recent Open Incidents

content.query:

    | where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/vulnerabilities"
    | extend severity=properties['severityScore'],
    deviceId=tostring(properties['deviceId']),
    score=properties['score'],
    cveName = properties['vulnerabilityId'],
    cveDes=properties['description']
    | project deviceId
    | join  kind=leftouter (iotsecurityresources
             | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices'
             | project Site=tostring(properties.sensor.site), name) on $left.deviceId == $right.name

    | project site = iff(Site=="", "Managed IoT Hub", Site), count_

content.title: CVEs by Severity

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
| where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/vulnerabilities"
| extend DeviceID = tostring(properties.deviceId)
| extend severity=properties['severityScore'],
    deviceId=tostring(properties['deviceId']),
    score=properties['score'],
    cveName = properties['vulnerabilityId'],
    cveDes=properties['description']
| mv-expand components=properties['affectedComponents'] 
| extend vendor=components['vendor'],
    version=components['version'],
    type=components['type'],
    product=components['product']
| extend Severity=properties.severityScore
| join  kind=leftouter (iotsecurityresources
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices'
         | project DeviceSiteName=tostring(properties.sensor.site), name) on $left.DeviceID == $right.name
| summarize count() by tostring(cveName), tostring(vendor) 
| summarize count() by tostring(vendor) 
| where vendor != '*'
content.title: CVEs by Vendor

content.query:
iotsecurityresources
| where type == "microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/vulnerabilities"
| extend DeviceID = tostring(properties.deviceId)
| extend severity=properties['severityScore'],
    deviceId=tostring(properties['deviceId']),
    score=properties['score'],
    cveName = properties['vulnerabilityId'],
    cveDes=properties['description']
| extend Severity=properties.severityScore
| join  kind=leftouter (iotsecurityresources
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/devices'
         | extend DeviceName = tostring(properties.deviceName)
         | project DeviceSiteName=tostring(properties.sensor.site), name, DeviceName) on $left.DeviceID == $right.name
 | join kind=leftouter
    (iotsecurityresources 
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
         | where properties.status != "Closed"
         | extend name3= tostring(properties.extendedProperties.SourceDeviceAddress)
         | summarize AlertCount=count() by name3) on $left.DeviceName == $right.name3 
| join kind=leftouter
    (iotsecurityresources 
         | where type=='microsoft.iotsecurity/locations/devicegroups/alerts' 
         | where properties.status != "Closed"
         | where tostring(properties.extendedProperties.DestinationDeviceAddress)!=tostring(properties.extendedProperties.SourceDeviceAddress)
         | summarize AlertCount2=count() by name4=tostring(properties.extendedProperties.DestinationDeviceAddress)) on $left.DeviceName == $right.name4 
| summarize Total = count(), Critical = countif(tostring(severity) == "Critical"), High = countif(tostring(severity) == "High"), Medium = countif(tostring(severity) == "Medium"), Low = countif(tostring(severity) == "Low") by deviceId, DeviceName, AlertCountSum=coalesce(AlertCount,0)+coalesce(AlertCount2,0)
| project DeviceName, AlertCountSum, Total, Critical, High, Medium, Low, deviceId
| sort by Total
| take 50
content.title: Top Vulnerable Devices
